responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "F2D83B6D40D85E86417ECE8EA21A05D6", "That\'s a heroic act, but you\'ll be ashes before your praised by the masses. But far be it from Bearskin Boone to keep a hunter from testing the mettle. Let me tell you a little something I learned in my last battle with the bear beast.")
name: MADD_0005A_TIG_NPC_BearskinBoone_9
